TextView.android:text: Issuance of Certification for Live Animals Intended for Travel and Slaughter

This service caters to individuals or private sector who wants to secure Inspection Certificate for live animals intended for travel or slaughter. The role of the Municipal Agriculture Office is to inspect that the live animals is healthy, showed no signs of illness upon inspection.
1. One (1) Original copy of Barangay Certification attesting to the ownership and source of live animal the number of heads, color, age and sex of animal
Barangay hall where the animals are sourced
2. Animal credential (for cattle, carabao and horses)
1. Proceed to the Municipal Agriculture Office – Administrative frontline personnel, sign visitor’s logbook and present required documents
1.1. Receive, and verify completeness of documents submitted
3. Proceed to the MTO for the payment
4. Return to Municipal Agriculture Office and present Official Receipt 9OR0
4.3. Facilitate the approval of certificate by the Municipal Agriculturist
5.2. Have the client sign the service logbook
6.1. Request client to accomplish Client Satisfactory Survey Form (CSSF)
Admin Aide/ Agricultural Technologist\n\nMunicipal Agriculture Office
